title: Maddman: The Steve Madden Story
description: This documentary chronicles the rise of the footwear designer behind a billion-dollar empire and his subsequent comeback after a financial scandal.

title: Magic of Houdini
description: Exploring the career of illusionist Harry Houdini, Alan Davies visits a collection of Houdini relics and even tries out some of his acts.

title: Magicians: Life in the Impossible
description: Four magicians with specialties that span the illusion spectrum share personal stories and offer some surprising professional insights.

title: Making Fun: The Story of Funko
description: "Pop culture purveyor" Funko started in a garage in 1998. Today its vinyl figures are beloved worldwide, and the company credits fans for its success.

title: Making the American Man
description: This documentary explores modern masculinity in America by profiling companies that are committed to creating domestically made products for men.

title: Marching Orders
description: A top-ranked college marching band’s members fight to keep their spots, memorize routines, tend to their social lives -- and slay the competition.

title: Martin Clunes: A Lion Called Mugie
description: Join conservationists in Kenya as they rescue an orphaned lion cub and try to prepare him for the daunting challenges of life in the wild.

title: Martin Clunes: Heavy Horsepower
description: Martin decides it's time for his young Clydesdales to pull their weight on the farm and travels the world to see how working horses are used today.

title: Martin Clunes: Last Lemur Standing
description: Travel deep into the rain forests of Madagascar to glimpse rare and fascinating lemurs, and meet the people racing to save them from extinction.

title: Martin Clunes: Man to Manta
description: On a quest to learn more about the elusive manta ray, Martin dives into a tank in the Georgia Aquarium and stakes out a mass feeding in the Maldives.

title: Martin Luther: The Idea that Changed the World
description: This docudrama tells the dramatic story of the monk who took on the Catholic Church, tracing his life before and after the contentious "95 Theses."

title: Mateo
description: Matthew Stoneman, a white man from New England, discovers a talent for mariachi music while in prison and heads to Cuba to pursue his dreams.

title: Maya Angelou: And Still I Rise
description: Poet and civil rights activist Maya Angelou is celebrated using her own words set over rare photographs and video illustrating her remarkable life.
actors: Maya Angelou, Cicely Tyson, Common, John Singleton

title: Maynard
description: Friends, family and political titans recall the impact of Atlanta's Maynard Jackson, the first African-American mayor of a major Southern city.

title: Meet the Trumps: From Immigrant to President
description: Learn about Donald Trump's family history, including his immigrant grandfather's gold-rush enterprises and his dad's development of a property empire.

title: Mercury 13
description: After rigorous testing in 1961, a small group of skilled female pilots are asked to step aside when only men are selected for spaceflight.

title: Million Pound Motors
description: Follow dapper automobile broker Richard Biddulph as he locates and acquires extravagantly priced vintage cars for his fabulously wealthy clientele.

title: Minimalism: A Documentary About the Important Things
description: People dedicated to rejecting the American ideal that things bring happiness are interviewed in this documentary showing the virtues of less is more.

title: Miss Representation
description: Explore how the mainstream media's often disparaging portrayals of women contribute to the under-representation of females in positions of leadership.

title: Miss Sharon Jones!
description: This uplifting documentary follows R&B singer Sharon Jones's battle with pancreatic cancer while keeping her band intact for a return to the stage.

title: Mission Blue
description: This documentary follows oceanographer Sylvia Earle's campaign to save the world's oceans from threats such as overfishing and toxic waste.
actors: James Cameron, Michael deGruy, Sylvia Earle, Bryce Groark

title: Mission Control: The Unsung Heroes of Apollo
description: Combining archive footage with present-day interviews, this documentary explores how Apollo's mission control helped change the course of history.

title: Mitt
description: The real Mitt Romney is revealed in this documentary that goes beyond the sound bites with unprecedented access to his 2012 presidential campaign.

title: Monty Python Conquers America
description: Follow the evolution of the British sketch comedy troupe that redefined humor and shaped an entire generation of American comics.
actors: Graham Chapman, Eric Idle, Terry Jones, Michael Palin

title: Monty Python: Before the Flying Circus
description: Discover how six seemingly ordinary but supremely talented men became Monty Python, sketch comedy's revolutionary comedy troupe.
actors: Graham Chapman, Eric Idle, Terry Jones, Michael Palin

title: Monty Python: Live at Aspen
description: The members of Monty Python reunite on stage to talk about making their iconic show that changed sketch comedy forever.
actors: Robert Klein, John Cleese, Terry Gilliam, Eric Idle

title: Monty Python: The Meaning of Live
description: From heyday to curtain call, this documentary offers a rare glimpse of the legendary Monty Python troupe as it stages live shows after a long hiatus.
actors: John Cleese, Terry Gilliam, Eric Idle, Terry Jones

title: Mortified Nation
description: This comic documentary follows the Mortified movement, a series of stage events where adults share awkward childhood moments in front of strangers.

title: Mother with a Gun
description: Learn how Shelley Rubin came to lead the Jewish Defense League and examine the organization's inner-workings, history and mission.

title: Mr. Dynamite: The Rise of James Brown
description: This biographical documentary examines the early life and career of musical icon James Brown, from abandoned, impoverished child to Godfather of Soul.

title: My Own Man
description: When a man discovers he will be the father to a boy, his fear and insecurities send him on an emotional, humorous quest for his own manhood.

title: My Scientology Movie
description: After speaking with former Scientology members and being stonewalled by higher-ups, filmmaker Louis Theroux hires actors to re-create alleged events.

title: My Son the Jihadi
description: Briton Sally Evans recounts the devastating story of her 21-year-old son's radicalization and move to Somalia to join an al-Qaida-affiliated group.
